creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, image of buiding with an obscured banner hanging from it that read "RA / OS," with printed title and "SQUATTING ANALYZED / FROM THE OUTSIDE!" inscribed along the top in black ink ballpoint pen; 16 pp.
inscription: front cover, black ink pen: SQUATTING ANALYZED / FROM THE OUTSIDE!
title: Squat the World!
